name: Paper 1: Reading and Writing - Part 1
questionContents: On Saturdays, a lot of people visit the library where Elena works and it is always ...
'The job is ... because I meets a lot of different people.'Elena says
Her job is to ... all the books when people bring them back.
Elena has to put all the books back on the ... shelf.
Sometimes people ... to return their books on time.

name: Paper 1: Reading and Writing - Part 2
questionContents: What about going shopping this afternoon?

name: Paper 1: Reading and Writing - Part 4
questionContents: If you enjoy camping, you'll need this to sleep in.
People learn to play music on this.
If you like reading stories about pop stars, you may need to buy these every week.
